spacegame.server
Class ClientInfo

java.lang.Object
  spacegame.server.ClientInfo

public class ClientInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds information about a client that is connected to the server, and also some functionality to send messages to the client.

Author:
Caleb Wilson

Constructor Summary
ClientInfo(java.net.Socket s)
          This constructor creates a new client based on a socket obtained on the Server from ServerSocket.accept()
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getJob()
          This method returns the job of the client represented by this object
 java.lang.String getName()
          This method returns the name of the client represented by this object
 java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
          This method returns an OutputStream connected to the client
 java.io.PrintWriter getPrintWriter()
          This method returns a PrintWriter connected to the client.
 java.net.Socket getSocket()
          This method returns the socket that is connected to the client that the object represents.
 int getUID()
          This method returns the Unique Identifier (UID) assigned to the client when this object was created.
 void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
          This method sends the given message to the client it is representing.

          This method sets the job of the client represented by this object

getUID

public int getUID()
This method returns the Unique Identifier (UID) assigned to the client when this object was created. UIDs are assigned incrementally starting at 1 (UID of 0 is reserved for the server terminal).

Returns:
the UID of the client

getPrintWriter

public java.io.PrintWriter getPrintWriter()
This method returns a PrintWriter connected to the client. Don't forget to flush() !!!!!

Returns:
PrintWriter to client

getOutputStream

public java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
This method returns an OutputStream connected to the client

Returns:
OutputStream to client

getSocket

public java.net.Socket getSocket()
This method returns the socket that is connected to the client that the object represents.

Returns:
the socket connected to the client
